ContinuityModels Module
==============

The `ContinuityModels` module contains classes and functions related to maintaining and enforcing continuity 
equations within single hydroclimatic realizations and across ROF calculations.

Contents
--------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Submodules:

   Base/index

API Reference
-------------

Below is the API reference for the `ContinuityModel` module. Documentation is automatically extracted from the header files.

   :project: WaterPaths
